overview: Inviting an exchange student to live in your home and experience the American way of life is something that can be very exciting and memorable for all members involved. Meet Alina Li, from China who hooks up with a hot surfer boy on the beach. Then there is Natalia Starr from Poland who gets to fuck her American teacher. Selma Sins from Spain who gets it on with her tutor. A host family's oldest son gets deep into Israeli exchange student Penelope Stone's hot little twat. Nadia Capri from Bosnia loves cooking naked and soon finds her host brother buried balls deep in her sweet pussy. These are experiences these students will treasure their entire lives. Why not get an exchange student today?
title: Exchange Students
